awd_titl_txt: RUI: Basic Research Equipment for Lower Paleozoic           Synsedimentary Tectonics, Southwest Colorado
awd_abstract_narration: This award provides one-half the funds required for the                    acquisition of equipment for rock sample preparation and                        microscopic analysis that will be operated and maintained by the                Department of Geology at Fort Lewis College. The College will                   provide the remaining funds necessary.                                               The award is being made under the guidelines of the NSF                    program for Research in Undergraduate Institutions, and use of the              equipment will be incorporated into the undergraduate training                  program of the Department of Geology as well as employed in the                 geological research of the stratigraphy, sedimentology and                      tectonics of the lower Paleozoic rocks of the San Juan Mountains                in southwestern Colorado.
